maqras.text: Kare no ato, ware wa sono min ni taishi ten kara gunzei o tsukawashi wa shinakatta. Mata-so suru made mo nakatta
Tada hitokoe sakebu dake de, kare-ra wa kieusete shimatta
A, awarena shimo be-tachi yo. Kare-ra wa shito ga kuru tabi, chosho shite kakatta
Kare-ra wa kidzukanai no ka, jibun-tachi izen ni iku sedai no mono o ware ga horoboshi, kare-ra wa 2-do to kaeranai to iu koto o
Sorezore mina wa,(shinpan no hi) isseini ware no mae ni mesa reyou
Kare-ra e no shirushi no 1tsu to shite wa, ware ga shinda daichi o yomigaera se, kokumotsu o sore kara seisan shi, sore o kare-ra ga taberu koto ga age rareru
Mata ware wa, soko ni natsumeyashi ya budo no en o moke, sonoaida ni izumi o waki dasa seru
Kare-ra wa sono kajitsu o taberuga, soreha kare-ra no te ga tsukuridashita monode wanai. Soredemo kansha shinai no ka
Kare no eiko o tataeru. Kare wa daichi ni haeru mono, kare-ra jishin mo, mata kare-ra no shiranai mono mo, subete shiyu ni tsukura reta katadearu
Mata kare-ra e no shirushi ni wa, yoru ga aru. Ware ga sore kara hiru o doka seru to, miyo, makkura ni naru
Mata taiyo wa, kisokutadashiku unko suru. Kore mo zen'no zenchina okata no setsuridearu
Mata tsuki ni wa, tengu o furiwaketa. (Sore o kayotte) natsumeyashi no oita yohei no yo ni (hosoku natte) modotte kuru
Taiyo ga tsuki ni oitsuku koto wa narazu, yoru wa hiru to saki o arasou koto wa dekinai. Sorera wa, sorezore no kido o oyogu
Mata mansai shita fune ni, ware ga kare-ra no shison o hakonda koto mo shirushi no 1tsudearu
Mata ware wa kare-ra ga noru,(-gai no benrina) norimono o tsukutta
Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra o obore saseru koto ga dekiru. So nareba, kare-ra o tasukeru mono wa naku, sukuwa re wa shinai
Tada ware no jihi ni yotte tsukanoma o kyoraku suru dakedearu
Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no mae ni aru mono, mata ushiro ni aru mono o osore nasai. So sureba anata gata wa, kanarazu jihi ni azukarerudearou.' To iwa rete mo (mimiwokasudokoroka)
nushi kara no shuju no shirushi ga shimesa rete mo, sukkari, se o mukete shimau

Mata,`arra ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinko suru mono ni iu. `Arra ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, doshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu
Mata, kare-ra wa iu. `Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, nanji kono (shinpan) no yakusoku (ga hatasa reru no)desu ka
Daga kare-ra ga ronso shite iru ma ni, hitokoe no sakebi ga (totsuzen) kare-ra o osou dakede wanai ka
Sonotoki kare-ra wa, yuigon suru koto mo, mata kazoku no tokoro ni kaeru koto mo dekinai
Soshite rappa ga fuka reru to, kare-ra wa hakaba kara (dete),-nushi no omoto ni isoideiku

Kare-ra wa iu. `A , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi o fushido kara yobiokoshita no wa daredeshou ka. Kore wa, jihibukaki okata ga yakusoku nasa reta toride wa arimasen ka. Shito-tachi no kotoba wa shinjitsudeatta nodesu ka
Tada hitokoe narihibikeba, isseini kare-ra wa ware no mae ni meshi atsume rareru
Sonohi ni wa dare mo, sukoshi mo futona atsukai o ukezu, anata gata wa, tada jibun no okonatta koto ni taishi mukui rareru
Hontoni rakuen no nakama-tachi wa, kono Ni~Tsu, yorokobi ni å¿™ Ga shi
Kare-ra wa sono haigusha-tachi to, kokage no nedoko ni yorikakaru
Soko de kare-ra wa, kajitsu ya nozomi no mono o nandemo e rareru
Jihibukaki nushi kara `heian'are.' To no o kotoba mo aru
Anata gata tsumibito-tachi yo, kyo wa hanarete hikae nasai
